name: Deploy to Firebase Hosting

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  build_and_deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout repo
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Setup Node
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: 20
          cache: npm

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm ci

      - name: Build project (Vite)
        run: npm run build

      - name: Deploy to Firebase Hosting
        run: npx firebase-tools deploy --only hosting --project yoga-time-bea36 --token "${{ secrets.FIREBASE_TOKEN }}"
